description.en: Total Quality Management (TQM) is a philosophy of management for continuously improving the quality of goods, services and processes. TQM is a combination of quality and management tools that aim to increase benefits and reduce losses due to wasteful practices. This course will present the various TQM concepts, frameworks, and principles that form a foundation for implementing the quality culture. The course also gives an overview on widely implemented quality standards. During the course various quality improvement tools and techniques are explained and compared. The course will provide the participants with the understanding of the arrangement of TQM on the example of various organizations in order to demonstrate how to implement TQM in practice.
description.et: Terviklik kvaliteedijuhtimine on toodete, teenuste ja protsesside pideva parendamise juhtimise filosoofia. Terviklik kvaliteedijuhtimine on kvaliteedi ja juhtimise vahendite kombinatsioon, mille rakendamise tulemuseks on tulu kasv ja raiskamise vähendamine. Kursuse käigus antakse ülevaadet erinevatest tervikliku kvaliteedijuhtimise kontseptsioonidest, käsitlustest ja printsiipidest, mis on kvaliteedi olulisust rõhutava kultuuri aluseks. Kursus samuti sisaldab ülevaadet laialt rakendavatest kvaliteedi standarditest. Kursuse käigus selgitatakse ja võrreldakse erinevaid kvaliteedijuhtimise töövahendeid ja tehnikaid. Kursus võimaldab saada ülevaadet tervikliku kvaliteedijuhtimise korraldusest ja praktikasse rakendamisest erinevate organisatsioonide näidetel.

objectives.en: This course will provide with the the overview of Total Quality Management (TQM) approaches, frameworks, underlying principles, standards, tools and techniques with emphasis on both theory and practice.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on anda ülevaade tervikliku kvaliteedijuhtimise käsitlustest, kontseptsioonidest, printsiipidest, standarditest, töövahenditest ja tehnikatest nii teoorias kui ka nende rakendamisest praktikas.

learning_outcomes.en:
Upon successful completion of the course, students are able
to:
Comprehend the TQM theory, frameworks and principles.
Understand the essence of quality standards (ISO9000, ISO14000, OHSAS, SA8000 etc.).
Realize TQM arrangement in the organization.
Distinguish between various TQM tools and techniques (e.g. CI/Kaizen, FMEA, 5S, Six Sigma, Pareto charts, Fishbone/Ishikawa Diagrams etc.).
learning_outcomes.et:
Kursuse eduka läbimise tulemusena tudeng:

independent_work.et:
1. Homework assignment: Article review. The team (3 people) have to choose one topic dealing with the subject of TQM. The examples of topics are: History of TQM, TQM tools and techniques, TQM models, ISO standards, TQM implementation etc. Each team member have to read one scientific article (article min 2 500 words) on the chosen topic. The team have to make a short joint presentation (5-7 min) or comprehensive joint review (min 1 000 words) according to the chosen topic and articles. 

2. Written essay in group. Essay is based on the companies' visits (each group member have to visit at least one company) and should reflect the ability of the student to link theoretical material with practice. The essay should focus on one topic of the course which is analyzed on the example of three (at least two) visited companies.

More instructions will be provided in Moodle.
